channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 Must-Watch Movies New To Netflix This Week (February 2 - 8, 2026)
item.description: 5 critically acclaimed movies just dropped on Netflix. From Oscar nominees to blockbusters, here's what to watch this week.

item.title: 1 Way For Introverts To Measure Their ‘Social Battery’
item.description: Identifying as an introvert is the first step. Here’s what you can do after you know the limits of your social battery.

item.title: C4Q 2025 And 2025 Hard Disk Drive Industry Update
item.description: HDD unit shipments, exabyte shipments and revenue were up significantly in C4Q 2025 and in 2025 as a whole. Continued growth is expected in 2026.

item.title: OpenAI launches Codex app to bring its coding models, which were used to build viral OpenClaw, to more users
item.description: OpenAI is locked in an increasingly intense battle with rival Anthropic over tools to create AI agents. The debut of the Codex app comes weeks after A...

item.title: Government shutdown will delay release of January jobs report
item.description: The partial government shutdown that began over the weekend will delay the release of the January jobs report slated for release on Friday.

item.title: Devon Energy CEO: ‘Stars align’ to acquire Coterra for nearly $26 billion as merger mania returns to the oilfield
item.description: The massive Permian Basin merger creates a combined Devon with a $58 billion enterprise value.

item.title: If AI is roiling the job market, the data isn’t showing it, Yale Budget Lab report says, raising questions of ‘AI-washing’ to justify mass layoffs
item.description: Some analysts have projected AI will displace 7% of U.S. workers. Yale economists said it’s just too early to tell.

item.title: The Rise Of Co-Investments And How Direct Deal Participation Is Reshaping Private Capital
item.description: The private equity landscape is experiencing a fundamental shift in how limited partners (LPs) and general partners (GPs) collaborate on investment op...

item.title: Why Bitcoin is in a bear market: Analyst points to 3 factors after currency swoons below $75,000
item.description: The original cryptocurrency recovered slightly on Monday.

item.title: ‘We are an n of 1’: Palantir hails ‘incredible’ earnings as stock rockets nearly 8% after hours
item.description: Palantir looks into its all-seeing orb and sees full-year revenue between $7.18 billion and $7.2 billion.

item.title: Apple Releases iPhone Software Update To Address Emergency Call Issue
item.description: Apple’s latest iPhone update is designed to fix an issue which has affected emergency services since December.

item.title: Dow ends over 500 points higher, S&P 500 just shy of record as U.S. stocks climb
Dow up over 500 points in final hour, S&P 500 aims for record close — live
Silver plunges into bear market for the first time since 2022. What comes next?
The dollar’s decline this year is unlike its large selloff in 2025

New SNAP work requirements take effect in more states under Trump-backed law
item.description: New SNAP work requirements are taking effect in additional states, expanding eligibility rules and reshaping benefits under a Trump-backed law.

item.title: Costco issues recall notice for bakery item due to undeclared allergen
item.description: Costco has recalled mislabeled "Mini Beignets filled with Caramel" that could cause allergic reactions due to undeclared tree nuts in 22 states.

item.title: Trump picks veteran staffer to head Bureau of Labor Statistics
item.description: President Trump plans to nominate economist Brett Matsumoto to head the Bureau of Labor Statistics, elevating a career staffer who has worked at the a...

item.title: Business leaders celebrate Trump's Fed chair pick
item.description: Business leaders praised Trump's nomination of Kevin Warsh as Federal Reserve chairman, citing his extensive experience and proven crisis management e...

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
